CF-Indicator-Descr: Aggregate conflict forecast metric, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of normalized CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B values [mean(norm(CAST_totalevents_im), norm(VIEWS_fatalities_im), rank_norm(BSE_im))] per forecast time-interval [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

ACLED CAST. Forecasted total number of political violence events in (3 or 6)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following ACLED and CAST definitions and codebook (ACLED column: total_forecast).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. VIEWS. Forecasted total number of fatalities in (3 or 6 or 12)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following UCDP and VIEWS definitions and codebook (VIEWS column: main_mean).

VIEWS. Forecasted total number of fatalities in (3 or 6 or 12)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following UCDP and VIEWS definitions and codebook (VIEWS column: main_mean).

Conflict Forecast Barcelona. Forecasted risk for any violence in the next 12 months [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval] (following BSE and UCDP definitions and codebook; column: anyviolence_12).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

VIEWS. Forecasted total number of fatalities in (3 or 6 or 12)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following UCDP and VIEWS definitions and codebook (VIEWS column: main_mean).

VIEWS. Forecasted total number of fatalities in (3 or 6 or 12)-month interval, as given in [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval], following UCDP and VIEWS definitions and codebook (VIEWS column: main_mean).

Conflict Forecast Barcelona. Forecasted risk for any violence in the next 12 months [Date-StartForecastInterval,Date-EndForecastInterval] (following BSE and UCDP definitions and codebook; column: anyviolence_12).

Aggregate conflict forecast rank, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of the normalized ranks of CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B [mean(rank_normalized(CAST_total_events_i), rank_normalized(VIEWS_fatalities_i), rank_normalized(BSE_conflictintensity_i))] per forecast time-interval  [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).

Aggregate conflict forecast metric, calculated for each admin1 i as the mean of normalized CAST, VIEWS, and CF-B values [mean(norm(CAST_totalevents_im), norm(VIEWS_fatalities_im), rank_norm(BSE_im))] per forecast time-interval [Duration-ForecastInterval_Months]. Note the averaging for this aggregate metric is done per forecasting time-interval (3, 6, or 12 months), so we use the most recent data from all forecasting systems and write the resulting aggregate score into one common time-interval [t_start, t_end], but neglect potential differences in date (+/- 1 month) of most recent available data (VIEWS, CAST, BSE).
